title: Blogging is epic
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
My name is Poody and I have done some epic stuff. This is the place where you will see reports of such epic stuff.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Epic Poody Blog
description: Welcome to our new Epic Poody Blog. Give it a read!
